name: Defensive Little Tank Destroyers
description:
A simple, small top down tank survival game. Survive for as many waves as possible before the enemy destroys you.

Whats in the game:
-2 playable tanks to choose from

-3 different enemies and 2 bosses that will try to take you down

-18 pickups that will either benefit you or end you

-Explosions!

Be sure to read the read me. If not that is fine too, I guess...

I've tested many things on this first build and everything seems to work, but there may be some
things that I probably did not encounter.
*Known small issues
-Camera may be jittery.
-Trackmaster tank likes to slighty turn left while moving

-Button click sound may not play when returning to main menu after a game session

If you would like to see more content made for this game, suggest or just to report bugs, etc. etc. then you can contact me via email: sebk.stuff@gmail.com
